title: On the Clebsch-Gordan coefficients for the two-parameter quantum algebra $SU(2)_{p,q}$
abstract: We show that the Clebsch - Gordan coefficients for the $SU(2)_{p,q}$ - algebra depend on a single parameter Q = $\sqrt{pq}$ ,contrary to the explicit calculation of Smirnov and Wehrhahn [J.Phys.A 25 (1992),5563].
